text: @realDonaldTrump Lies & BS! Everything Trump does is in his own interest. He waited 2 mos before taking action on Covid19 killing 107k & rising. He banned travel but only to China not Europe. He botched testing, PPE & ventilators & started a bidding war. He’s inept.
